Oil is worthless. Oil, gas, & coal receive $600+ bn direct & indirect subsidies annually. End the subsidies. Give pensions to industry veterans. Fund a new "New Deal" - a #GreenNewDeal, to transition & train millions to rebuild our energy & infrastructure.

PA feelings on state govt's COVID-19 response:
38% NOT AGGRESSIVE ENOUGH. 
40% "just right."
17% too aggressive. 

#PA01, this minority will march on state capitals & dominate headlines. The other 78% should demand US Congress pass HR 6496 so ppl stay home & get financial relief. https://t.co/o5w1wHnA1v

22+ million = Newly unemployed Americans.
27 million = Uninsured Americans prior to COVID19.

0 = other developed countries link healthcare to employment because HEALTHCARE IS A HUMAN RIGHT.

The US and #PA01 needs #MedicareForAll now more than ever.

https://t.co/qMcgcAjjgS

How to #SaveThePostOfficeüí°

-Congress bails out banks Bank 

-Post offices ARE banks in most countries- servicing rural & urban alike. 

-25% of Americans are unbanked.

-Bailout @USPS, allow it to serve as a bank & it will come back more profitable than ever. Guaranteed. #PA01

100% agree.

Happy Easter to all those who celebrate across #PA01 and the rest of the country! With all that is going on, try to take the day to relax, call your family and friends, and remember there‚Äôs a light at the end of the tunnel when we all stick together. #easter2020 https://t.co/YlapnEnQM1

#VoteByMail is essential to keep communities safe during #COVID19 but USPS will be out of cash by September.

Congress & #PA01 incumbent @RepBrianFitz must fulfill Constitutional duties to post office.

Nearly 10% of all Americans live without access to the internet ‚ùå

Although it may seem to be a luxury, access to high speed internet is vital for workers to perform their job functions or even find a job on the market

It is time we guarantee access to affordable internet ‚úÖ

Eliminate insurance bureaucracy üìÑ
Visit any doctor üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è

We must make sure that all public schools in #PA01 are well funded and are equipped to provide remote learning if needed.

My campaign also stands in solidarity with teachers across PA-01.

Thank you, @BernieSanders. Time will show your call for a 21st Century Economic Bill of Rights was the medicine we needed & that #NewDeal scale investments directly in infrastructure, workers, and families are what will allow us to prosper as we did coming out of the depression.

PA state 40.8 / 1.6%

Bucks Co. 44 / 2.8%
Italy 45.5 / 12.6%

#PA01 must take care- this virus hits our elderly harder. To save lives, stay home & demand Congress provide monthly cash disbursements.

It is important for the safety of our communities that you wear a mask when you go out in public. 

A face mask is excellent to help prevent the spread but remember to wash your hands before putting the mask on or taking it off as suggested by the World Health Organization. üëè https://t.co/zhztAwoKV1

Want #ventilators & workers rights? We must tax obscene wealth. #FairTaxPlatform NOW, #PA01. https://t.co/A5vzscW9lO

Recent stimulus = $2.2+ trillion.
$250bn for 1-time $1200 checks.
$349bn for small business loans.

Imagine if, instead of prioritizing corporate debt & deferment- we directly eliminated #StudentDebt payments impacting 44+ million families?

We just need the political will. #PA01 https://t.co/GxwxPfFbiO

The #FairTaxPlatform puts workers and families first in Bucks and Montgomery Counties. It provides comprehensive solutions where most politicians serve up the same old platitudes.

Join our #PA01 movement today and vote-by-mail in the June 2nd primary.

Nice title, @RepBrianFitz - but the devil is in the details. 

"Made in America" and "Made by American owned entities" have ENTIRELY DIFFERENT meanings. 

Which one is it?

3M is American owned but the majority of their manufacturing is in China. 
#PA01 https://t.co/OoqokIiAUv https://t.co/ftwweIFVbl

If you still find yourself saying #MedicareForAll "wouldn't do anything for this crisis" then you are failing to see the forest for the trees. 

It is not only those afflicted with #COVID19 that suffer.

Healthcare is a human right and should not be tied to employment. #PA01 https://t.co/7Fo19vRLK2

That would be one heck of a birthday surprise- receiving the dial-in for one of Fitz's townhalls. 

It won't happen though. Never has. Doubt that it ever will. 

If #PA01 wants an unscreened, uncensored virtual #townhall, join me Saturday at 11am. 

https://t.co/t82Wsvqox6 https://t.co/rlZFpu19rD

Convention delay = normalized ‚úÖ
General election delay = ??

Our general election in November must not be a question mark. It must occur.

Americans deserve the stability and security of knowing they have comprehensive #healthcare w/ no premiums, copays, deductibles, or out of pocket costs.

https://t.co/FvcQTeQiEE https://t.co/YoAJOIop9Y

How about surviving the virus, only to receive a bill for over $30,000? Some have received bills in excess of $70,000 for treatment. 

Is this the best the wealthiest nation on earth can muster during a pandemic?

I don't think so. We are better than this.
https://t.co/QieIjO7LWH https://t.co/3vVzMmIWkL

The consequences of our inhumane #healthcare system are before us now. 

A 17-yr old died in California from #COVID19. He didn't have insurance & couldn't get treated. 

We are America. We can and must do better. 
Need another example of where we are now?

https://t.co/DB06ZAVccI https://t.co/YpWcJSUJbE

Please DO NOT flush paper towels & other wipes!

Stay safe!

Across the world countries are paying 70-90% of salaries for  companies that keep their workers employed. 

In contrast, we have a means tested proposal that favors large business.

Going live for an interview with Darryl on @WNPVRadio in Lansdale in a few minutes at 12:20pm! 

Tune in to 98.5 FM or 1440 AM!
#PA01

$250.

#MedicareForAll

With the current situation surrounding the #Coronavirus, it is important that we remember that it should not take a global pandemic to make sure healthcare is affordable for all people. 

#HealthcareIsAHumanRight and we must fight every day until we are guaranteed that right.

When it comes to public health, it is important that we help everyone in order to prevent the spread of disease. 

When we have a vaccine for Coronavirus, we must ensure that it is free and that tests are widely available to all people. We can limit the spread of COVID-19.

As many begin to stay home to limit #coronavirus exposure, now is a great time to watch the #PA01 Democratic candidate debate. 

The April 28 PA primary is fast approaching & #VoteByMail ballots already being cast! 

Scroll to the bottom & stream for free:
https://t.co/2BA3TVXiYI

Stay safe #PA01. Stay considerate.
If you feel even remotely sick, stay home. Wash your hands. Throw out tissues. Remember: just because you don't feel awful doesn't mean you can't infect someone with a compromised immune system or an elderly person that could fair worse than you https://t.co/JsWQ5RGoZE

Were your classes canceled? Do you have off from work?

We can take action today! We can phone-bank to get in contact with voters without having the risks from Coronavirus. 

Join us!

Once in office, I'll fight for #HousingForAll, paid sick leave & #MedicareForAll w/ no premiums, copays, deductibles or out of pocket expenses. 
At this moment #PA01, I urge you- do what you can. Support your community food pantry. Call. Ask what they need https://t.co/9m7IlVcnyB

But you expect me to believe @BillGates & @JeffBezos deserve their BILLIONS? 

Documents & marketplaces weren't new. Yet they have 5345x the wealth of the internet creators.
